info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-access-point-cfg-rpc - RPC Operations
info.description:
Copyright (c) 2019-2023 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

**Module:** `Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-access-point-cfg-rpc`
**Version:** 2025-03-01
**Operations:** 44

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-access-point-cfg-rpc structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-access-point-cfg-rpc.html)

post.summary: Configure VLAN tagging for non-bridge AP
post.description:
Configure VLAN tagging for non-bridge AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-vlan-tag`

ap-name.description: AP name for VLAN tagging

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP for VLAN tagging

post.summary: Configure VLAN tagging for all non-bridge APs
post.description:
Configure VLAN tagging for all non-bridge APs

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-vlan-tag-all`

vlan-id.description: Configure VLAN ID. VLAN ID 0 will disable VLAN tagging for all non-bridge APs

post.summary: Configure channel scanning optimization for AP
post.description:
Configure channel scanning optimization for AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-monitor-mode-chnl-optimize`

mode.description: Select AP mode (none, tracking mode, WIPS mode, all)

ap-name.description: AP name for channel scanning optimization

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP for channel scanning optimization

clear-mode.description: Restores AP to site tag mode

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure AP mode

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure AP mode

ledstate.description: Led state of AP can be enabled (true) or disabled (false)

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure LED state

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure LED state

led-flash-state.description: LED flash can be enabled (true) or disabled (false)

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure LED flash

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure LED flash

location.description: AP location (example sector A or room A)

ap-name.description: AP name for location change

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP for location change

ap-name.description: Existing name of AP to be renamed

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to be renamed

band-val.description: Band value can be single or dual

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure the antenna band mode

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure the antenna band mode

country-string.description: Country code for country of operation (i.e. US for United States)

ap-name.description: AP name for configuring country of operation

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP for configuring country of operation

chan.description:
Channel number
         1 - 173: Dual band
         1 - 14: 2.4 GHz
         36 - 173: 5 Ghz
         1 - 233 : 6 Ghz

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure new channel

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure channel number

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure channel number

post.summary: Configures the external antenna gain of AP
post.description:
Configures the external antenna gain of AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-slot-ext-antenna-gain`

external-antenna-gain.description: External antenna gain value in multiple of .5 decibel isotropic units (i.e. An integer value 4 means 4 x 0.5 = 2 decibel isotropic units of gain)

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure the external antenna gain. Valid value range is 0-3

band.description:
Radio frequency band to configure external antenna gain.
         1 - 2.4 GHz
         2 - 5 GHz
         3 - Dual band
         4 - 6 Ghz

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure the external antenna gain

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure the external antenna gain

chan.description:
Channel number
         1 - 173: Dual band
         1 - 14: 2.4 GHz
         36 - 173: 5 Ghz
         1 - 233 : 6 Ghz

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure channel number

band.description:
Band of AP to configure channel number
         1 - 2.4 GHz
         2 - 5 GHz
         3 - Dual band
         4 - 6 GHz

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure channel number

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure channel number

post.summary: Configures static channel on a radio interface of access point
post.description:
Configures static channel on a radio interface of access point

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-slot-phy-ht-chan`

slot-id.description: Specifies slot id of a radio band

band.description: Specifies radio band information of access point

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure static channel

mac-addr.description: Mac address of AP to configure static channel

post.summary: Enables auto channel selection for a radio band of AP
post.description:
Enables auto channel selection for a radio band of AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-slot-phy-ht-customize`

slot-id.description: Specifies slot id of a radio band

band.description: Specifies radio band information of access point

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure auto channel selection

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure auto selection

post.summary: Configures clean air functionality on radio band of access point
post.description:
Configures clean air functionality on radio band of access point

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-cleanair`

slot-id.description: Specifies slot id of a radio band

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure clean air

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure clean air

mode.description:
DUAL RADIO MODE status
           0 - None
           1 - Enable
           2 - Disable

dual-radio-mode-op.description:
DUAL RADIO MODE operation
           0 - None
           1 - Auto
           2 - Manual

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure the 802.11 Dual radio mode

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure Dual radio mode

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure Dual radio mode

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure the 802.11 channel width

band.description:
Current band of AP
         1 - 2.4 GHz
         2 - 5 GHz
         3 - Dual band
         4 - 6 GHz

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure channel width

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure channel width

post.summary: Configures clean air functionality on radio band of access point
post.description:
Configures clean air functionality on radio band of access point

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-band-cleanair`

band.description:
Band of AP to configure clean air
         1 - 2.4 GHz
         2 - 5 Ghz
         3 - 6 Ghz

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure clean air

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure clean air

post.summary: Configures the radio role of AP
post.description:
Configures the radio role of AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:dual-band-role`

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure the 802.11 radio current band.

band.description:
Current band of AP
         1 - 2.4 GHz
         2 - 5 GHz
         3 - Dual band

mode.description:
Mode of an AP radio slot
         1 - Local
         2 - Monitor
         4 - Sniffer

sub-mode.description:
Sub Mode of an AP radio slot
         0 - None
         1 - Auto
         2 - Manual

chan.description:
Channel to be sniffed
         1 - 165: Dual band
         1 - 14: 5 GHz
         36 - 165: 2.4 Ghz

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure the radio role

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure the radio role

fra-revert-auto-only.description:
TRUE : Revert only XOR radios currently in automatic band selection.
         FALSE : Revert all XOR radios

fra-revert-mode.description:
TRUE:  Put XOR radios in automatic band selection.
         FALSE: Put XOR radios in static 2.4GHz/5GHz/6GHz band

band.description:
Current band of AP
         1 - 2.4 GHz
         2 - 5 GHz
         3 - Dual band
         4 - 6 GHz

radiotype-check.description:
Radio type check
           0 - no radiotype check
           1 - non dual-band
           2 - dual-band

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure BSS color

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure BSS color

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure BSS color

radiotype-check.description:
Indicates whether  it is dual band radio or dedicated band radio
         0 : no radiotype check
         1 : non dual-band
         2 : dual-band

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure BSS color mode

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure BSS color mode

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure BSS color mode

ant-id.description:
Antenna port selection
         1 : Antenna port A
         2 : Antenna port B
         3 : Antenna port C
         4 : Antenna port D
         5 : Antenna port E
         6 : Antenna port F
         7 : Antenna port G
         8 : Antenna port H

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP configure 802.11n antenna selection

band.description:
Current band of AP
         1 - 2.4 GHz
         2 - 5 GHz
         3 - Dual band
         4 - 6 GHz

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure 802.11n antenna selection

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure 802.11n antenna selection

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure the 802.11 Dual band

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure channel mode

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure channel mode

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure the 802.11 Dual band

chan.description:
Channel to be configured
         1 - 173: Dual band
         1 - 14: 2.4 GHz
         36 - 173: 5 Ghz
         1 - 233 : 6 Ghz

band.description:
Current band of AP
         1 - 2.4 GHz
         2 - 5 GHz
         3 - Dual band
         4 - 6 GHz

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure channel number

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure channel number

post.summary: Configures the 802.11 dual-band radio's current band i.e 2.4GHz/5GHz
post.description:
Configures the 802.11 dual-band radio's current band i.e 2.4GHz/5GHz

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:dual-band-radio-band`

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure the 802.11 dual-band radio's current band. Valid value range is 0-2

band.description:
Current band of AP
         1 - 2.4 GHz
         2 - 5 GHz
         3 - Dual band

toband.description:
New band to switch AP to from current band
         1 - 2.4 GHz
         2 - 5 GHz

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure the 802.11 dual-band radio's current band

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure the 802.11 dual-band radio's current band

mode.description: LAN port can be enabled (true) or disabled (false)

poe-enabled.description: PoE of the LAN port can be enabled (true) or disabled (false)

power-level-id.description: Power level of the LAN port

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure AP LAN port

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure AP LAN port

post.summary: Configure indoor or outdoor mode of AP
post.description:
Configure indoor or outdoor mode of AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-indoor-enable`

enable.description: Indoor mode of an AP can be enabled(true) or disabled(false)

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure the indoor or outdoor mode of AP

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure the indoor or outdoor mode of AP

post.summary: Configures controller information in access point
post.description:
Configures controller information in access point

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-controller`

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure controller information

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure controller information

post.summary: Reset all APs in a site
post.description:
Reset all APs in a site

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-site-reset`

site-tag-name.description: Site tag on which all APs need to reboot

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure the led brightness level

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure the led brightness level

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure transmit power level. Valid value range is 0-3.

band.description:
Band of AP to configure transmit power level
         1 - 2.4 GHz
         2 - 5 GHz
         3 - Dual band
         4 - 6 GHz

ap-name.description: AP name for configuring transmit power level

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP for configuring transmit power level

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP to configure the antenna mode. Valid value range is 0-2

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure the antenna mode

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure the antenna mode

ap-name.description: AP name for changing AP admin state

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP for changing AP admin state

mode.description: Mode of AP to configure admin state

slot-id.description:
AP slot ID to configure admin state
          Allowed slot ID for bands are
            1 - slot ID 0
            2 - slot ID 1 and slot ID 2
            3 - slot ID 0 and slot ID 2
            4 - slot ID 2 and slot ID 3

band.description:
Radio frequency band of AP to configure admin state.
          1 - 2.4 GHz
          2 - 5 GHz
          3 - Dual band
          4 - 6 GHz

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure admin state

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure admin state

post.summary: Enable auto RF on a slot
post.description:
Enable auto RF on a slot

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-slot-tx-power-customize`

mode.description: Select mode as CONFIG AUTO to configure transmit power of AP

slot-id.description: Slot ID of AP radio on which to configure transmit power. Valid value range is 0-3.

band.description:
Radio frequency band to configure transmit power on.
          1 - 2.4 GHz
          2 - 5 GHz
          3 - Dual band
          4 - 6 Ghz

ap-name.description: Name of AP to configure transmit power of AP

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP to configure transmit power of AP

post.summary: Add or delete vlan from mDNS AP
post.description:
Add or delete vlan from mDNS AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:mdns-ap-config`

ap-name.description: Name of the mDNS AP on which to enable/disable VLAN

mac-addr.description: Radio MAC address of the AP on which to enable/disable VLAN

ap-name.description: AP name

mac-addr.description: AP radio MAC address

site-tag-name.description: Send ranging information to all AP's under site-tag

all-aps.description: Send ranging information to all AP's

ranging-mode.description: Set ranging mode of all AP's

ranging-band.description: Set ranging band of all AP's

ranging-method.description: Set ranging method of all APs

ap-name.description: AP name for configuring AP coordinate

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP for configuring AP coordinate

ap-name.description: Name of the AP for configuring floor

mac-addr.description: MAC address of AP for configuring floor

post.summary: Set UWB Downlink Time Difference of Arrival clustering
post.description:
Set UWB Downlink Time Difference of Arrival clustering

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cfg_rpc:set-ap-uwb-dltdoa`

cluster-grp-json-params.description: Cluster group AP shall be part of

ap-name.description: Name of the AP being configured

mac-addr.description: Radio MAC address of the AP being configured
